verses.text: VAKAI, hono ‘ikai lelei, pea hono ‘ikai sai Ke nonofo ha kāinga, ‘o fakataha foki!
‘Oku hangē ko e lolo lelei na‘e lingi ki he ‘ulu, Na‘e hifo ki he kava ē, Ki he kava ‘o ‘Ēlone; Na‘e hifo ki he kola ‘o hono kofu;
Hangē ko e hahau ‘o Heamone, Na‘e hifo ki he ngaahi mo‘unga ‘o Saione: He ko e potu ia na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ai ‘e Sihova hono tāpuekina, Ko e mo‘ui ‘o ta‘engata.
